short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves a selected quote or portion of text from a webpage to a specified Google Spreadsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture and organize noteworthy quotes or text snippets from any webpage! This Chrome extension allows you to seamlessly save selected quotes directly to your specified Google Spreadsheet, streamlining your information management and making research a breeze
